entry.title: Nativity Fragrance Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 22.80

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame when you pair our Soy Wax Melts with our Nativity Fragrance Warmer! This Christmas fragrance/melt warmer features antique brushed, copper cut to reveal a glowing nativity scene. A perfect way to reflect on the reason for the season on a cozy, silent night.

Simply place 6-12 Soy Wax Melts into the warmer, flip the warmer on with a simple on/off switch on the cord, and enjoy up to 13 hours of cozy fragrance with a soothing, ambient glow. The removable dish also makes changing out your wax easy to ensure your home is always filled with delightful smells.

INCLUDES: NP5 Warming Bulb (25W 120V). 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch. 1 Year limited warranty.

DIMENSIONS: 8.8" x 4.6" x 4.6"

 

This warmer features a one-of-a-kind glaze or hand-painted design; the final finish may vary.

Enjoy more Soy Wax Melt products.

entry.title: Tree Farm Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Selling out, and going fast!

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Tree Farm is a trip down memory lane to favorite holiday traditions. It’s the joy of bundling up and heading to the tree farm to find the perfect Christmas tree with family. Walking through the trees, the air is filled with the scent of freshly trimmed evergreens, Fraser fir, and cedar. The familiar, cozy feeling of laughter and the excitement of bringing home a special tree to light up your home are truly the magic of the season.

This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Natalie @vintageporch, featuring a strong strength that is a staple for the season.

“It's the whole ‘family Christmas’ feeling you get when you smell the pine scent. You turn on the music…you light the candle...it’s CHRISTMAS!” 

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.


WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

entry.title: Speckled Plug-In Fragrance Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 20.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame when you pair our Soy Wax Melts with our Specked Plug-In Fragrance Warmer! This mini fragrance/melt warmer features a speckled, transitional-farmhouse inspired design with points of light on all sides for a classic, homey look.

Simply plug the warmer into an outlet (out of reach of children or pets), and place 4-6 Soy Wax Melts into the ceramic warmer. Flip the warmer on with a simple on/off switch at the base of the plug-in, and enjoy up to 13 hours of cozy fragrance in your small space with a soothing, ambient glow. The removable dish also makes changing out your wax easy to ensure your home is always filled with delightful smells.

INCLUDES: NP7 Warming Bulb (15W 120V). Rotating base. Plug compatible with 3-prong US outlets. 1 Year limited warranty.

DIMENSIONS: 2.8” x 3.8”

This warmer features a one-of-a-kind glaze or hand-painted design; the final finish may vary.

Enjoy more Soy Wax Melt products.

entry.title: White Plug-In Fragrance Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 20.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame when you pair our Soy Wax Melts with our White Plug-In Fragrance Warmer! This mini fragrance/melt warmer features a hobnail pattern reminiscent of a depression glass/milk glass-inspired design, with points of light on all sides for a classic, modern look.

Simply plug the warmer into an outlet (out of reach of children or pets), and place 4-6 Soy Wax Melts into the ceramic warmer. Flip the warmer on with a simple on/off switch at the base of the plug-in, and enjoy up to 13 hours of cozy fragrance in your small space with a soothing, ambient glow. Use a cotton ball to easily change out your wax and ensure your home is always filled with delightful smells.

INCLUDES: NP7 Warming Bulb (15W 120V). Rotating base. Plug compatible with 3-prong US outlets. 1 Year limited warranty.

DIMENSIONS: 2.8” x 3.8”

entry.title: Vanilla Spice Latte by To Mimi's House We Go Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Vanilla Spice Latte is a delightfully spiced scent of cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger with a cozy, warm blend of fresh espresso, maple brown sugar, and vanilla cream. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Tina @to_mimi’shousewego!

"Vanilla Spice Latte captures that feeling of snuggling up with a warm drink and a good book. The spicy notes blend perfectly with sweet vanilla cream and espresso undertones to create a homey atmosphere I know you'll love as much as I do!"

With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this spiced fragrance features a strong strength that combines all the best, cozy feels of Sweater Weather in a jar—perfect for those who love just a splash of coffee with their sweet and spiced cream.

Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman is a cozy scent of spiced vanilla cake, intertwined with a warm, sweet medley of cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, ginger, and hazelnut. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Karlee @karleegailbowman!

“This cozy candle takes me back to baking in my parent's kitchen. It's spicy with a dark molasses and hazelnut creme, with a splash of my homemade vanilla. It has a spice that fills the air. If I close my eyes while I smell it, I'm home.”

With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this spiced and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly captures the nostalgic aroma of warm, spice cake baking in the oven.

entry.title: White Candle Warmer Lamp
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 42.00

Enjoy your favorite candle without the flame when you pair our Mason Jar Candles with our NEW White Candle Warmer Lamp! This modern, elegant lamp is uniquely designed with ‘top-down’ technology to create the cozy ambiance of a glowing candle, without the flame, while filling your space with your favorite smells.

Place your candle (up to 22 oz, or up to 6” tall) on the wooden base. We recommend using the 16 oz Mason Jar candle size for best results. Use the easy-flip switch on the cord to turn your lamp on and start melting the surface of your candle to release fragrance within minutes. Allow entire surface of candle to melt at least 0.5-1” before turning off. The same wax can be melted 2-3 times, then carefully dispose of melted wax to allow the un-melted, fragranced wax underneath to melt and freshen your space.

 

INCLUDES: NP5 Warming Bulb (25 W 120 V). 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch.

DIMENSIONS: 7.75” x 5.25” x 10.75”

 

Shop more Home Décor and Candle Looks in our décor shop.

entry.title: Black Flip Dish Fragrance Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 32.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame when you pair our Soy Wax Melts with our NEW Black Flip Dish Fragrance Warmer! This elegant fragrance/melt warmer features a soft, matte black ceramic dipped in metallic gunmetal (also known as red brass) with a hand-applied finish for a stylish, modern appeal.

Simply place 6-12 Soy Wax Melts into the ceramic warmer, flip the warmer on with a simple on/off switch on the cord, and enjoy up to 13 hours of cozy fragrance. No need to ever change a bulb—the metal warming plate heats the wax at the perfect rate to ensure your home is always filled with delightful smells. Once the wax is completely cooled, the removable dish makes changing out your wax easier than ever by simply 'flipping' it to pop out your used wax!

INCLUDES: Silicone Flip Dish. 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch (120V, 60Hz, 24W). 1 Year limited warranty.

DIMENSIONS: 5" x 3.5" x 3.5"

This warmer features a one-of-a-kind glaze or hand-painted design; the final finish may vary.

Enjoy more Soy Wax Melt products.
